mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_message (group_id, sender_id, content, content_type) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{senderId}, #{content}, #{contentType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler})
mapper.select: SELECT gm.id, gm.group_id as groupId, gm.sender_id as senderId, u.username as senderUsername, u.nickname as senderName, u.avatar as senderAvatar, gm.content, gm.content_type as contentType, gm.recalled, gm.create_time as createTime FROM group_message gm INNER JOIN user u ON gm.sender_id = u.id WHERE gm.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY gm.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT gm.id, gm.group_id as groupId, gm.sender_id as senderId, u.username as senderUsername, u.nickname as senderName, u.avatar as senderAvatar, gm.content, gm.content_type as contentType, gm.recalled, gm.create_time as createTime FROM group_message gm INNER JOIN user u ON gm.sender_id = u.id WHERE gm.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY gm.create_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM group_message WHERE group_id = #{groupId} AND id > #{lastReadMessageId}
mapper.update: UPDATE group_message SET recalled = true WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT gm.id, gm.group_id as groupId, gm.sender_id as senderId, u.username as senderUsername, u.nickname as senderName, u.avatar as senderAvatar, gm.content, gm.content_type as contentType, gm.recalled, gm.create_time as createTime FROM group_message gm INNER JOIN user u ON gm.sender_id = u.id WHERE gm.group_id = #{groupId} AND gm.recalled = false AND gm.content_type = 'TEXT' AND gm.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY gm.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
